Bio

A little about me; I am finishing up my final courses of my undergraduate degree at the University of Toronto. I am pursuing an Arts & Science Degree in Computer Science with a specialization in Software Engineering. My main interests within the professional field of Computer Science and Software Development are in cybersecurity, backend development, and deployment strategies.

Cognos Disclosure Management
Manager: Claude Zhang
Email: claude.zhang @ rbc.com
Data Analyst (Co-op)
9/10/18 - 4/26/19
  • Maintained and edited high profile reports - such as the Earnings Release, Report to Shareholders, etc. - ensuring proper governance is being followed.
  • Cognos Disclosure Management (CDM) was used as the primary tool for report maintenance. CDM can be considered as an extension of Microsoft Office that adds variable declaration and use functionality.
  • Created automation scripts using Visual Basic for excel and word.
  • Created a project management and reporting system - using CDM - that generated progress reports which were then distributed to upper management on a weekly basis. This solution saved our internal client 260 hours annually - in turn attracting other internal clients to a total time savings of over 600 hours annually if adopted.
